loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You have successfully signed in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Fill in the details below to create your account.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Please check your email for verification.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, providing clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, effects, and sacred traditions of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Access our complete guide.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay updated on our upcoming events, share experiences, and connect with other seekers on the path of healing. Your transformation begins here.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, traditionally used in shamanic ceremonies for healing and spiritual revelation. It is made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna plant (Psychotria viridis), which contains the psychoactive compound DMT.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness that can lead to deep introspection, emotional release, and spiritual insights. The experience, often called a "journey," can help individuals confront and heal past traumas, gain clarity on their life's purpose, and experience a profound sense of connection with the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is revered as a master teacher plant. She guides participants through their inner landscapes, revealing truths, healing emotional wounds, and teaching lessons tailored to each individual's needs. The journey is one of respect, courage, and openness.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many report a significant reduction in mental clutter, leading to improved focus, creativity, and a clearer perspective on life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: A powerful tool for addressing deep-seated emotional wounds, trauma, depression, and anxiety by bringing them to the surface to be processed and released.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Facilitates a profound sense of interconnection with nature, the universe, and one's own spiritual essence, often leading to lasting positive changes.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a safe and supportive group setting, allowing for shared energy and collective healing. Ideal for those seeking community and connection.
privateCeremonyDescription: A personalized and intimate experience tailored to your specific intentions and needs, offering focused attention from our guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced and compassionate guides who will support you on your healing journey.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content, settings, and users.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the new theme.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony's details.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can reactivate it later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from all public views. You can reactivate it later from the ceremonies page.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our active, past, and upcoming events.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
authRequiredDescription: You need to be logged in to view ceremony details. Please sign in or create an account.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View, manage, and communicate with your users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all registered users in the system.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailSubjectPlaceholder: An announcement for our next ceremony...
emailBodyPlaceholder:
Hello everyone!

We are excited to invite you...
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used to ensure a safe experience.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medications, especially for depression or anxiety (e.g., SSRIs)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychedelics?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience:
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been saved securely.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed the first step. Now, let's prepare your body, mind, and spirit for this transformative experience.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's submitted answers below.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire answers have been submitted by this user yet.
preparationProcessDescription: The days leading up to the ceremony are crucial. A specific diet and mental preparation are required.
ceremonyProcessDescription: During the ceremony, you will be guided and cared for in a safe and sacred space.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique. It can be a profound experience of healing and self-discovery.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you understand and integrate the lessons learned into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: Cleansing your body is essential to receive the medicine in the best way possible.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Prepare your mind and spirit to be receptive and open.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and feelings. This helps clarify your mind before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca works deeply on an emotional level. It is common to experience a wide range of feelings, from joy and love to sadness and fear. It is a process of purification and release. Trust the medicine and the guides; you are in a safe space to feel and heal.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this content.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this page.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the ceremonies.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Your email has been successfully updated. You may need to re-verify it.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.
systemLogsDescription: A list of errors recorded in the application.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates used to invite users to fill out the questionnaire.
defaultInvitationMessageES:
🌿✨ Ayahuasca Ceremony Preparation ✨🌿
The ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine that acts as a great spiritual teacher 🌀
Its purpose is to help you cleanse the body, release stagnant emotions, and reconnect with your true essence 💫💖

When you have time, please help us with this form. You can register with your Gmail account, and we will have your details on record. We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar.

You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire 📘

This way, you can also see the complete preparation guide and pre-diet 7 days before so you can prepare correctly: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/preparation

With love, respect, and presence 🙏
El Arte de Sanar 🌿🤍
defaultInvitationMessageEN:
🌿✨ Ayahuasca Ceremony Preparation ✨🌿
Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine that acts as a great spiritual teacher 🌀
Its purpose is to help you cleanse your body, release stagnant emotions, and reconnect with your true essence 💫💖

When you have time, please help us with this form. You can register with your Gmail account, and your data will be saved. We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar.

You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire 📘

You will also be able to see the complete preparation guide and pre-ceremony diet for the 7 days prior to prepare correctly: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/preparation

With love, respect, and presence 🙏
El Arte de Sanar 🌿🤍
